topic.title: How can I have a list of website in ZeroNet
topic.body:
Hello everyone,

Do you know how can i have a list of website available on ZeroNet.
Like in previous version: http://zero.pags.to:43110/1NNrpHSsucpLxE2MkRj8GPX1Rh1anJfw8h.
Thank you

1_1N1WCav1oetiu7QpKNXmsfxpeGrEtZ3gCe.body:
Thank you.
It will be great if they are something like a search engine. ^^ I know I ask many questions :)
Thank you crypton. It is exactly what I searched
